title: What do you think about Scripters, GD?
body:
I've been noticing that whenever someone posts a video showing proof that someone may or may not be scripting, regardless of how solid the evidence actually is, there's usually a bunch of dislikes on the video and quite a number of individuals who are trying to deny that its scripting (possible trolls you know, blahblahblah the guy is just a pro git guud hurr durrr jurrr wurrrr zurrr).

Are people really just trolling or are people actually in denial about Scripters existing? 

What say you, GD?
